languages.text: "Положите руку на большой рычаг. И аккуратно — аккуратно — дайте немного тяги". {n}Лицо Монтэга сосредоточенно, но голос не утрачивает шутливой веселости.{/n} "Дикарь не любит, когда суетятся".
"Put your hand on the big lever and gently give it a pull. Very gently!" {n}Einrich's face is focused, but his voice has not lost any of its playful cheer.{/n} "Savage does not like being hassled."
languages.original_text: "Положите руку на большой рычаг. И аккуратно — аккуратно — дайте немного тяги". {n}Лицо Монтэга сосредоточенно, но голос не утрачивает шутливой веселости.{/n} "Дикарь не любит, когда суетятся".

traits.locale_text: "Put your hand on the big lever, and gently give it a little pull. Very gently!" {n}Monteg's face is focused, but his voice has not lost any of its playful cheer.{/n} "Savage does not like being hassled."

"Put your hand on the big lever, and gently give it a little pull. Very gently!" {n}Monteg's face is focused, but his voice has not lost any of its playful cheer.{/n} "Savage does not like being hassled."

"Put your hand on the big lever and gently give it a little pull. Very gently!" {n}Einrich's face is focused, but his voice has not lost any of its playful cheer.{/n} "Savage does not like being hassled."
"Put your hand on the big lever and gently give it a pull. Very gently!" {n}Einrich's face is focused, but his voice has not lost any of its playful cheer.{/n} "Savage does not like being hassled."
"Put your hand on the big lever and gently give it a pull. Very gently!" {n}Einrich's face is focused, but his voice has not lost any of its playful cheer.{/n} "Savage does not like being hassled."

languages.text: «Ponga la mano en la palanca grande y tire con suavidad. ¡Poco a poco!». {n}Ves la concentración en el rostro de Einrich, pero su voz no hay perdido ni un ápice de su entusiasmo travieso.{/n} «A Salvaje no le gusta que le metan prisa».
languages.original_text: "Put your hand on the big lever and gently give it a pull. Very gently!" {n}Einrich's face is focused, but his voice has not lost any of its playful cheer.{/n} "Savage does not like being hassled."

traits.locale_text: «Ponga la mano en la palanca grande y tire con suavidad. ¡Poco a poco!». {n}Ves la concentración en el rostro de Einrich, pero su voz no hay perdido ni un ápice de su entusiasmo travieso.{/n} «A Salvaje no le gusta que le metan prisa».

languages.text: 「大きなレバーに手をかけて、そっと引いてみてください。優しくね！」 {n}アインリッヒは集中した表情だが、声は明るいままだった。 {/n}「サベージは急かされるのは嫌なんだ」
languages.original_text: "Put your hand on the big lever and gently give it a pull. Very gently!" {n}Einrich's face is focused, but his voice has not lost any of its playful cheer.{/n} "Savage does not like being hassled."

traits.locale_text: 「大きなレバーに手をかけて、そっと引いてみてください。優しくね！」 {n}アインリッヒは集中した表情だが、声は明るいままだった。 {/n}「サベージは急かされるのは嫌なんだ」

languages.text: “把手放在最大的拉杆上，轻轻地拉一下，要非常轻柔！”{n}艾因里奇的眼神非常专注，但声音中却带着顽皮的欢乐。{/n}“萨维奇不喜欢被人骚扰。”
languages.original_text: "Put your hand on the big lever and gently give it a pull. Very gently!" {n}Einrich's face is focused, but his voice has not lost any of its playful cheer.{/n} "Savage does not like being hassled."

traits.locale_text: “把手放在最大的拉杆上，轻轻地拉一下，要非常轻柔！”{n}艾因里奇的眼神非常专注，但声音中却带着顽皮的欢乐。{/n}“萨维奇不喜欢被人骚扰。”

languages.text: "Legt Eure Hand auf den großen Hebel und zieht sanft daran. Sehr sanft!" {n}Einrichs Miene ist konzentriert, aber seine Stimme hat nichts von ihrer verspielten Leichtigkeit verloren.{/n} "Wild mag es nicht, wenn man ihn unter Druck setzt."
languages.original_text: "Put your hand on the big lever and gently give it a pull. Very gently!" {n}Einrich's face is focused, but his voice has not lost any of its playful cheer.{/n} "Savage does not like being hassled."

traits.locale_text: "Legt Eure Hand auf den großen Hebel und zieht sanft daran. Sehr sanft!" {n}Einrichs Miene ist konzentriert, aber seine Stimme hat nichts von ihrer verspielten Leichtigkeit verloren.{/n} "Wild mag es nicht, wenn man ihn unter Druck setzt."

languages.text: « Placez votre main sur le gros levier et tirez doucement. Très doucement ! » {n}Einrich affiche une expression concentrée, mais sa voix n'a rien perdu de sa jovialité habituelle.{/n} « Sauvage n'apprécie pas qu'on le malmène. »
languages.original_text: "Put your hand on the big lever and gently give it a pull. Very gently!" {n}Einrich's face is focused, but his voice has not lost any of its playful cheer.{/n} "Savage does not like being hassled."

traits.locale_text: « Placez votre main sur le gros levier et tirez doucement. Très doucement ! » {n}Einrich affiche une expression concentrée, mais sa voix n'a rien perdu de sa jovialité habituelle.{/n} « Sauvage n'apprécie pas qu'on le malmène. »

languages.text: "Elinizi büyük kola yerleştirin ve nazikçe itin. Çok nazik olun!" {n}Einrich'in yüzünde odaklanmış bir ifade olsa da ses tonu, oyunbaz neşesinden hiçbir şey kaybetmemiş.{/n} "Hoyrat, zorlanmaktan hoşlanmaz."
languages.original_text: "Put your hand on the big lever and gently give it a pull. Very gently!" {n}Einrich's face is focused, but his voice has not lost any of its playful cheer.{/n} "Savage does not like being hassled."
